text: Xi Jinping has given the Trump Organization and the Trump family SCORES of incredibly valuable trademarks since 2017. If you don't understand the connection between this fact and Trump accepting Xi Jinping's lies about COVID-19 in January you're missing EVERYTHING going on here.
